author: VinInn
body:
see also
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSTRACK-118

it involves
SeedFromConsecutiveHitsCreator
Where I removed all existAs
SeedForPhotonConversion1Leg, MuonTrackLoader and GoodSeedProducer
where TTRHBuilder has been added to config

default config updated and tested

hlt to be done

note
GoodSeedProducer is the only producer
all others are just PSet
SeedFromConsecutiveHitsCreator used in SeedGeneratorFromRegionHitsEDProducer
SeedForPhotonConversion1Leg used in PhotonConversionTrajectorySeedProducerFromSingleLeg
MuonTrackLoader used in many MuonTrack producers
title: Fix 4 configs involving ttrh builder
